Revenger PRISM-1 120mm ARGB Case Fan

5 Reviews
$6

The Revenger PRISM-1 120mm ARGB Case Fan provides effective cooling. They provide a steady airflow of 30 CFM while operating at a fan speed of 1200RPM 10% to keep your system cool. Despite their powerful performance, they run quietly, producing 19.5 dBA of noise. The Revenger PRISM-1 120mm ARGB Case Fan has a 4-pin connector for easy installation, dimensions of 120 120 25mm, and a weight of 110g. These fans are dependable and convenient for enhancing your PC cooling system, with a power consumption of 3W 10% and a cable length of 40cm.
